mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room WHERE room_index IN ( SELECT room_index FROM room WHERE room.category_index IN (SELECT category_index FROM category WHERE location LIKE '%${req.location}%' AND kind LIKE '%${req.kind}%') AND room.address_index IN (SELECT room_address_index FROM room_address WHERE si_do LIKE '%${req.siDo}%' AND si_gun_gu LIKE '%${req.siGunGu}%') AND room.room_index IN (SELECT available_date.room_index FROM available_date WHERE date BETWEEN #{req.checkInDate} AND #{req.checkOutDate} GROUP BY room_index HAVING COUNT(room_index) >= ${differenceDay}) AND room.max_person > ${req.maxPerson} ) ORDER BY room.room_index DESC LIMIT ${index},15;
SELECT * FROM room ORDER BY room_index DESC LIMIT ${index},15;
